name: BEAR, VODKA, FALL OF BERLIN! 🐻
description:
BEAR, VODKA, FALL OF BERLIN! - this is the third part of the series of games "BEAR, VODKA,.."

This time, Motherland sent you to fight against the Nazi forces to capture Berlin. . The game character is in the ruins of the city of Berlin. The streets are full of Nazis. You have unlimited ammo and a desire to end the war. Use the “V” KEY to drink vodka and replenish health.

Therefore, your main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible on the way to the Brandenburg Gate.

Features:

  • Truly Russian spirit and atmosphere
  • Folk songs of the war years
  • Sweet Russian vodka
